meanings.definition: A small, shiny object used for decoration.
meanings.sent1: The jewelry box was filled with spangles and trinkets.
meanings.sent2: She collected spangles and beads to make her own unique jewelry.
meanings.sent3: The spangles on the keychain jingled merrily as she walked.
meanings.sent4: Her laughter was like spangles, bright and infectious.
meanings.sent5: The spangles on the party hat added a festive touch to the celebration.
